name: Puzzle to the Center of the Earth
name_original: Puzzle to the Center of the Earth
description:
Embark on an epic journey to the center of the Earth in this unique mix of platforming, digging, and match-three puzzling!

FEATURES

• Match-three meets platforming in a unique puzzler!
• Explore over 80 levels as you dig your way to the center of the Earth!
• Solve puzzles, find legendary treasure, and explore a vast underground world.
• One-handed gameplay is designed specifically for mobile devices.
• Overcome creatures, traps, cave-ins, lava, ice, underground oceans, and tons more!

Like us on Facebook or follow us on Twitter for the latest news:
facebook.com/foursakenmedia
twitter.com/foursakenmedia

Please note: Puzzle to the Center of the Earth is free to play, but allows players to purchase items in-game for real money. If you don't want to use this feature, just turn off app purchases on your device.
